Great gift ideas for guys on V-Day Find out his hobbies. If the guy is into wine you'll want to get a fabulous decanter. If the guy's into cigars maybe a humidor. Find out what he collects, what he's interested in. It can be as simple as golf balls with his name on it. You can come up with really cool concepts. Bernie Sanders Welch to get the appropriate waivers and flexibility for us to go forward toward a single-payer system.'' Welch said, When Vermont innovates, the nation often follows our lead. Providing Vermont and other states with the flexibility to build upon health care reform will result in better care and greater access at a lower cost. Allowing us to become a laboratory for innovation and excellence will help Vermonters, while once again allowing us to lead the way. Patrick Leahy said,`` While some in Washington are trying to turn the clock back on health reform, Vermont instead is moving forward.
